extension_description.message: Analyze the performance of your webpages and get specific suggestions on how to optimize them.
extension_description.description: A short description of the purpose of the extension.

fetching_content.description: Status message indicating that the extension is getting content for the Nth (of out MAX) resource of the page, located at the given URL.  This is displayed once for each resource.

fetching_har.description: Status message indicating that the extension is currently fetching the Http ARchive (HAR) representing the content of the webpage.

more_information.description: Text for a hyperlink that shows more information/documentation about the current rule.

no_rule_violations.message: There were no violations of this rule.
no_rule_violations.description: Indicates that the inspected page completely obeys the current rule.

overall_score_ads.description: Gives a 0-100 numeric score for the Page Speed rules, scoring only advertisements on the webpage (as opposed to the rest of the content), with 100 being the best.

overall_score_all.description: Gives a 0-100 numeric score for the Page Speed rules, with 100 being the best.

overall_score_content.description: Gives a 0-100 numeric score for the Page Speed rules, scoring only content on the webpage (as opposed to e.g. advertisements), with 100 being the best.

overall_score_trackers.description: Gives a 0-100 numeric score for the Page Speed rules, scoring only tracking scripts on the webpage (as opposed to the rest of the content), with 100 being the best.

reloading_page.description: Status message indicating that the extension is currently reloading the webpage.

running_rules.description: Status message indicating that the extension is currently running the Page Speed performance rules on the webpage.
